Vote against Amendment 1 and protect civil liberties in the Mountain State.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

No one can afford to sit on the sidelines this year. Our civil liberties are under constant attack in both Washington and Charleston. Early voting has started. We need you to get out and vote, and we need to defeat the extreme and dangerous Amendment 1.

Amendment 1 is a proposed amendment to the WV Constitution, put on the ballot by politicians who want to take away women's state-protected right to have a safe, affordable abortion. If Amendment 1 passes, it would pave the way for these politicians to pass other restrictive laws that could put the women in your lives in danger and leave their medical decisions in the hands of the government.

VOTE NO ON AMENDMENT 1

Find your early voting location, take a friend to the polls, vote AGAINST Amendment 1, and elect leaders who will protect and expand civil liberties for all people in West Virginia!

If you have any free time between now and Election Day sign up to volunteer with the Vote No on Amendment 1 Coalition to help defeat this dangerous referendum. If you haven't seen it yet, check out the TV commercial our coalition is running across WV and share it with friends.

Let's make history together,

Joseph Cohen
Executive Director, ACLU of West Virginia
